transcript: respect is always earned and the younger you are the more you have to earn it and you can either resent the world for not giving you respect that you do not deserve or you can go get it and the thing is is that at the end of the day with enough proof everyone will respect you hustle across age gender culture is always respected it's one of the universal currencies of respect but the problem is that people want the respect before they do the hustle and they have sequence wrong you got to do the hustle and then you get the respect
